member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADDefaults
member.summary: Constants for different Azure Active Directory authentication components.

member.summary: The scheme name for Open ID Connect when using .

member.summary: The scheme name for cookies when using .

member.summary: The default scheme for Azure Active Directory Bearer.

member.summary: The scheme name for JWT Bearer when using .

member.summary: The default scheme for Azure Active Directory.

member.summary: The display name for Azure Active Directory.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring authentication using Azure Active Directory.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.OpenIdConnectSchemeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the OpenID Connect authentication scheme to use for authentication with this instance of Azure Active Directory authentication.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.CookieSchemeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the Cookie authentication scheme to use for sign in with this instance of Azure Active Directory authentication.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.JwtBearerSchemeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the Jwt bearer authentication scheme to use for validating access tokens for this instance of Azure Active Directory Bearer authentication.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the client Id.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.ClientSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the client secret.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.TenantId
member.summary: Gets or sets the tenant Id.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.Instance
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure Active Directory instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.Domain
member.summary: Gets or sets the domain of the Azure Active Directory tenant.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.CallbackPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the sign in callback path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.SignedOutCallbackPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the sign out callback path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AzureAD.UI.AzureADOptions.AllSchemes
member.summary: Gets all the underlying authentication schemes.
